description:
Li Mochou is the elder disciple sister of Long Nu Xiao and considerably more powerful than Long Nu Xiao at the start of the series in terms of martial arts.
Although she is beautiful in appearance, she morphs into a vicious killer after her lover Lu Zhanyuan betrayed her.
However, she appears as a motherly figure to the baby Guo Xiang, whom she kidnaps from her parents. She is seen trying to take the "Jade Maiden Sutra" from Long Nu Xiao on several occasions, but has never been successful.
name: Li Mochou
